name: Trouble in Christmas Town
description:
Join Santa and his friends on an adventure across the North Pole! An exciting Advent calendar and interactive book for kids, complete with audiobook. Holiday fun for the whole family, with beautiful hand-drawn pictures, christmassy music and cute animations!

FEATURES
+ 24 scenes with beautiful hand-drawn illustrations
+ 24 story chapters, including book and audiobook version
+ Two hours of audiobook (about 5 min per day)
+ Cute animations, Christmas music and sounds
+ Explore pictures and animations by tapping
+ Mini game: Find the hidden item in every picture!
+ Reading area with adjustable font size
+ Insterest age 6+ | Reading age 10+
+ Even for grown-ups a lot of christmassy fun!

AN ADVENTUROUS CHRISTMAS STORY
Far up north, hidden by icy sea and snowy mountains, is a place called Christmas Town. The most important day of the year is almost here, when a thief steals Christmas Town's biggest treasure! Santa discovers that his whole Christmas Day journey might be in danger! With his friends Rudolph the reindeer and Filly the elf he starts on an adventure across the North Pole to find the stolen Christmas treasure! On their journey they meet lots of different animals and elves living at the North Pole. Will they be able to track down this mysterious thief before it's too late? Visit Christmas Town and find out!

COLLECT HIDDEN ITEMS
Every pictures includes a hidden item – the star button will give you a hint! As soon as you collected the item, a new part of Santa's living room on the start screen will appear and slowly build a christmas scene!

TAP AND EXPLORE
Behind every door you find a colourful picture with hidden animations and sounds.

READ OR LISTEN
A book button in every chapter opens the reading section. Read the story or listen to the included audiobook version!

SAVE FOR KIDS
- No ADS
- No IN-APP PURCHASES
